#EAM​  --- Tay

Current Status: Awaiting R&D

Current Tier: T2 Support

Customer Last comment: For logins, yes we would like to test out grabbing successful ones if possible. If it creates too much noise and data, we’ll look to pull it back on some servers or all. So just let us know what sort of script modifications are needed for this and we can go from there. (11/4/24)

Update: [From R&D] This is not active on the sprint yet. (11/6/24)

It creates 5 X 50MB files. If they fill it rolls over back to the first file, so it never uses more than 250MB, but the file size can be edited on this line near the top "ADD TARGET package0.event_file(SET filename=N'netwrix-enterprise-auditor--successful-logins', max_file_size=(50))" just alter 50 to the size needed. Delete it if it already exists and then run the job to create the extended event session again with the new file size

 

The bigger it is, the less of ten the job needs to pull the data, but the longer the job will take

 

frequent job runs with small files will be ideal

#EAM​  -- T. Caliguiri
